sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.

sentences.english: As the lack of understanding of the disease, it's often misdiagnosed or missed diagnosis.

sentences.english: Most were wiped out by a disease known as Chytrid fungus.

sentences.english: Results ERG and electrooculogram (EOG) became abnormal with the development of the disease.

sentences.english: A visit to the King of Medicine Temple in Dandong might cure you of all illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 到丹东的药王庙一游，可以治好一切疾病。

sentences.english: Increased pigmentation of the skin is common in Addison's disease.

sentences.english: The financial impact of treating obesity and obesity-related disease is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 注入肥胖症的财务冲击和与肥胖有关的疾病是可观的。

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞端粒长度不仅反映年龄变化而且反映疾病负担。

sentences.english: Many diseases proceed from negligence of hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 许多疾病源于不讲卫生。

person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient
